events.name: QuoteCreated
events.description: This event captures the creation of a new sales quote.

events.name: QuoteApproved
events.description: This event signifies that a sales quote has been approved.

events.name: QuoteRejected
events.description: This event captures instances where a quote is rejected.

events.name: QuoteSentToCustomer
events.description: This event indicates that a quote has been sent to the customer.

commands.name: CreateQuote
commands.description: This event captures the creation of a new sales quote.

commands.name: ApproveQuote
commands.description: This event signifies that a sales quote has been approved.

commands.name: RejectQuote
commands.description: This event captures instances where a quote is rejected.

commands.name: SendQuote
commands.description: This event indicates that a quote has been sent to the customer.

integrationPoints.name: CustomerService
integrationPoints.description: Integrate with the Customer Service context to fetch customer details.

integrationPoints.name: InventoryManagement
integrationPoints.description: Integrate with Inventory Management to confirm product availability for quotes.

integrationPoints.name: PaymentProcessing
integrationPoints.description: Integrate with Payment Processing for quote that lead into payment workflows.
